title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 20, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Oct 20, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's NFL Action. With the NFC continuing to look messy Dan wants to propose a new rule for next season. We're joined by former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker, MMQB Columnist Andrew Brandt, and legendary broadcaster Doc Emrick. Plus, we preview the World Series between the Dodgers/Rays starting tonight.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
